item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Yeah even  your Birthday within a few months either way, just make believe it is and join us to celebrate the times we have had and will have in the future in any events that we enjoy.

This is potluck but we always have lots of food if you don't bring any don't worry. Just come help us celebrate Birthdays, Spring, and Each Other!!!!

Bring a spare chair..

--------------------------------------------------

 

General Landmark:  Private Home (Close to the Hebron Fair Grounds).

 

Right now the Parking is limited to apx 20 cars ( and its a home where not too much more than 20 will become too crowded and conditions become chaotic..etc..) so RSVP'ees have to be limited for the inside also even if its warm enough for the outside fires.

Additional Parking is nearby and a short walk..

 


There are at least five of us with birthdays in March and some more a few months +/- .

 

 

What? ---   Can't we play in the snow?

The cake will look like a big snow ball, lets have a food fight with it ????

Na, lets eat it... Put some frosting on your self and be a real sweet treat for someone..

(Lets hope it no  snow on this weekend) or we will have to put some candles in it and Blow it away..

There will be a nice Outdoor fire in the new and improved fire pit if its nice out,

an INDOOR fire in the fire place for the warm relaxing environment we all like even if its good or bad outside.

This will be a cozy, relaxing event similar to most all of our indoor events.

Contact Kat for updates, parking, waiting list and questions.

Please bring a chair or a big floor pillow,

You can also bring your own favorite Adult beverage of choice,

Some Pot Luck food ( a grill will be available too),

and a happy Spring Season Cheerfulness attitude for this event.

Slippers or "inside" shoes would be helpful. I live in the country and have lots of mud around.

At least 5 of us will be on AARP's Most Wanted List when they see this listing.

Several in house Cats will welcome you and cover you with fur, try not to wear black. Please be careful, cats do NOT GO OUT the head Kat will bite you!

Yummy Birthday cake provided by hostess.

Al-r will have some special David Glass Chocolate Treats.

Be ready for a Happy Happy time.

 

 

Address and Driving directions will be sent out to positive RSVP'ees a few days or so prior to the event, so check your e mails BEFORE or during the Friday of the event weekend.

 

 

See some of you soon..

 

 

 

 

locusR229 e.st.h.
item.how_to_find_us: Details will be e-mailed out to positive RSVP'ees.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT

item.name: March Birthday Bash! It's a Luau! Wear a grass skirt and get Lei'd
